title: Yozakura Quartet
alternative_title: 夜桜四重奏 ～ヨザクラカルテット～
description: The story revolves around a quartet of teenaged heroes: A super-strong girl named Hime, a mind reader named Ao, a conjurer named Kotoha and an ordinary, powerless boy named Akina. The three girls and Akina protect the city of Sakurashin from supernatural threats.
